app_desc: This software application tool is provided as a global public good that would:
app_desc_1: enable anyone with the interest to understand better how electoral boundaries were drawn in their respective countries; and
app_desc_2: to create their own versions of boundary delimitation or drawing/redrawing of electoral district as they deem appropriate in accordance with the aforementioned universal standard and principles by using a readily available software application.
knowledge_hub_desc:
Find here information about :
Electoral Redistricting: Theory and Practices
map_library_desc: Browse through collections of electoral boundary uploaded by another user around the world
tutorial_desc: Learn about how our apps works, so you can create your own boundary delimitation or electoral district map.
getting_started_desc:
Welcome to Electoral Redistricting App! In this page, we will explain some things related to how to use the Electoral Redistricting App to create your own electoral district map. 
If you want to start creating your own electoral district map now, you can download the app from the links below, and use our ready to use sample data sets:
